name: The Orphanage Dungeon
description:
You are a young child who lives in an orphanage. You suddenly wake up in a dark room to see this message.

to whoever sees this message RUN NOW
the orphanage is hiding too much and it seems like they 
see you as a threat 
next to this message is a broken tv that i hacked to open
the door of your cell    fortunately they dont inspect the room 
so theres no worry about them finding out

good luck
